title: A Good Roux
description:
Swagu and Perk do a mental health check in and then discuss Steph Curry's place in NBA history, Perk's past criticism of the Celtics, the beef between Jimbo Fisher and Nick Saban, and why Stephen A. Smith hasn't been on the podcast yet. Let's get it!

itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
